column4: im using xchat-gnome. is there a way to connect to more than 1 server at a time ?
i tried that and nothing happened
is there an option for 'open new server tab' anywhere in the menu on the top of the screen?
if you hold for like 2 minutes I'll install it and find it
ahh i see it automatically opens a new server tab
in the past you had a choice
you could connect to a server in the existing tab or open a new server tab and connect to the server in there
yeah, I used xchat for a looong time
actually ive used linux for a long time but am switching to os x
if I had a mac I would use OSX probably :P
i dont have a mac but im using os x ;)
heh, I would, except none of my hardware is supported by osx86
im using osx86 on my gateway laptop....
3 or so years, but it has a weird video card
